product_name: eGear LED Jolt Mini Light/Volt USB Charger Combo - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The eGear LED Jolt Mini Light/Volt USB Charger combo ensures you'll always have a light handy and powered up when you're driving around. Combo pack includes a Jolt(TM) Mini LED light and a Volt(TM) USB charger. Jolt Mini light has a bright 25-lumen beam that illuminates dark spaces; operates in steady-on and flashing modes. Volt plugs into your car's cigarette lighter or 12V outlet to recharge the Jolt or other USB electronics, such as cell phones and music players (charging cables not included). The Jolt can also recharge using the USB port on any computer; built-in lithium battery recharges in about 2 hrs. to provide 2+ hrs. of runtime. Jolt glows red when charging and green when fully charged. Built-in clip attaches to your key chain, zipper or a loop on your backpack. Closeout.
short_description: The eGear LED Jolt Mini Light/Volt USB Charger combo ensures you'll always have a light handy and powered up when you're driving around.
